sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change entitlement downgrade rights table label Downgrades/Upgrades to Downgrade Rights</description>
        <name>Re label Downgrades/Upgrades table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var label = gs.getMessage('Downgrade Rights');
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'samp_downgrade_model');
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('label', label);
		gr.update();
	}

	var docObj = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
	docObj.addQuery('name', 'samp_downgrade_model');
	docObj.addNullQuery('element');
	docObj.query();
	if (docObj.next()) {
		docObj.setValue('plural', label);
		docObj.update();
	}
}());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-02-26 10:23:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>73a31662b7b323007684ff98ee11a986</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Re label Downgrades/Upgrades table</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_73a31662b7b323007684ff98ee11a986</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-02-26 11:07:07</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
